synonyms.synonym: RB intron encoded G-protein coupled receptor

protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Binds to oleoyl-L-alpha-lysophosphatidic acid (LPA). Intracellular cAMP is involved in the receptor activation. Important for the maintenance of hair growth and texture

go_class.description: purinergic nucleotide receptor activity, g-protein coupled
cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway

reference.reference_text: Toguchida J, McGee TL, Paterson JC, Eagle JR, Tucker S, Yandell DW, Dryja TP: Complete genomic sequence of the human retinoblastoma susceptibility gene. Genomics. 1993 Sep;17(3):535-43.
